body_html: To deal w/ a large text corpus while still using a single process, mainly we need to change the code to avoid loading the text file in memory in whole and instead use LineReader to maintain a sliding window over the corpus.

body: To deal w/ a large text corpus while still using a single process, mainly we need to change the code to avoid loading the text file in memory in whole and instead use LineReader to maintain a sliding window over the corpus.
